title: shiridum kavalaippaDAdE
sahitya:
shiridum kavalaippaDAdE mana urudiyai maTTum viDAdE edu vandAlum


caraNam 1    karu mEghangaL kalaindu kalai nira matiyaik-kaNDu
 kaLittiDum attirunAL uNDu manO dhiDam kunrAdE manaE 
  caraNam 2    shankaranai maravAdE sankaTangaL aNugAdE sattiyamE
 veTri perum uNmai prEmai narum kani uNbAi manamE
